title: Is it possible to check honor progress
body: If I go to profile my honor says "Level 2" but is there a way we can view the progress to level 3 and so on or is it just like a "once you get it, you get it" type deal

replies.body: It's more of a once you get it, you get it.  There's no visible meter to gauge your level, so consistency will be key!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YTA6graq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-05T22:58:27.762+0000)
>
> It's more of a once you get it, you get it.  There's no visible meter to gauge your level, so consistency will be key!

Just an idea, but that may actually hurt you guys in the long run. Since there is no way to tell how close you are to the next level, it will seem like you are making no progress. When no progress seems to be made, people tend to give up on the idea. Better to show the progress (no matter how slow) to encourage people to continue to do well and realize that there is an end goal.  

I love this idea of the honor system and I think it will do a lot for the community, but it is a bit frustrating to be getting all these honors and not seeing that they are doing anything. The black box you have set up at the moment makes it seem like you don't have it actually set in place yet (where you can actually level up), and I am loosing interest fast (as well as many others I know).
A visible way to shows the progress is super important.

Any idea/indication of how much/often Honor has to be gained to actually advance a level?

i also support being able to see your progress in the honor system, I've been getting 2-4 honors a game since this update and im not even honor 3 yet. I'd like to be able to see if im even somewhat close cause i feel like im ages away and it does demotivate me and im sure others that take their gaming, rank, and now honor feel the same way as i do.

Agree 100% with @CCUBED, being able to see the progress would encourage the continuance of the behavior required to actually attain the honor. After near a month maybe just over a month of playing with the system not being able to see progress gets quite discouraging. You may even consider asking the community how they feel about implementing a trackable gauge!
I feel there should be a way to view progress.
i feel the same, there should be a way to tell if you are progressing
I agree with Ccubed.  It will also show people who group queue, that honoring each other is a waste of time

I agree with this. The first dozen games I was like "Oh this is cool I'm getting lots of honor points" but now I'm over it. Do I need to play 10 more games or 100 more games? Also has anyone thought I was being unhonorable? I don't know because I cant see my progress so people wont want to change their behavior if they are bad for a while until they go down in honor.
